question_text: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English?

answer_rationales.C: Choice C is the best answer. The convention being tested is subject-verb agreement. The singular verb "has been" agrees in number with the singular subject "writing."
answer_rationales.A: Choice A is incorrect because the plural verb "were" doesn't agree in number with the singular subject "writing."
answer_rationales.B: Choice B is incorrect because the plural verb "have been" doesn't agree in number with the singular subject "writing."
answer_rationales.D: Choice D is incorrect because the plural verb "are" doesn't agree in number with the singular subject "writing."
